reviewText: it was advertised as 2 DVD's  when actually it was 1 and only 15 minutes long...a repeat of the U Tube version

This short DVD is basically a series of original songs about fire trucks and fire safety played over a collage of fire trucks, emergency vehicles, and firefighters. The DVD will appeal particularly to pre-school and early primary-grade school children. The songs are catchy and easy-to-learn. The video contains mostly shots from parades, though there are a few shots of vehicles racing from a firehouse to an emergency. Also included on the DVD is a segment with a firefighter talking about fire safety. Children will learn about the basics of fire safety including stop, drop, and roll; what to do if your house catches on fire; and the importance of making an escape plan ahead of time. Segments on the DVD include:

"Lots and Lots of Fire Trucks"
"Call 911"
"Fireman Jim's Safety Tips"
"Stop, Drop, and Roll"
"Your Home Safety Plan"
"It's an Emergency"
"Heroes Brave and Tall"
"Great Big Fire Trucks"
"Fire Trucks in Action"

The DVD includes a special menu (Classroom Section) that can be used by teachers, educators, presenters, etc. who would like to use a small portion of the video in class or as a presentation.
For what it is, LOTS & LOTS OF FIRE SONGS & SAFETY TIPS isn't too bad off a DVD. The only criticism I have is that the segment with the firefighter is of a lower quality video than the rest of the DVD; it's taken from completely different footage than anything else in the video and hasn't aged well. Really young kids won't notice, but by the time kids are in 2nd grade they will notice things like this, especially since they've been raised all their lives around hi-def, CGI-perfected media. Recommended for children 2-8 years-old.

This is a great video describing the contents of one of the award-winning children's series Lots and Lots of ... DVDs. Just Search for LOTS AND LOTS OF and you'll see the entire DVD series including: LOTS AND LOTS AND LOTS OF FIRE TRUCKS VOL.1 AND VOL.2 Lots and Lots of Fire Trucks DVD Vol. 1 LOTS AND LOTS OF MONSTER TRUCKS VOL.1 Lots and Lots of Monster Trucks DVD Vol. 1 MONSTER TRUCK CLASSICS 3 DVD SET MONSTER TRUCK CLASSICS 3 DVD Set LOTS AND LOTS OF TRAINS VOL.1, VOL.2 AND VOL.3 Lots and Lots of Trains DVD Vol 1 LOTS AND LOTS OF TOY TRAINS AND MODEL RAILORADS VOL. 1 Lots and Lots of Toy Trains and Model Railroads Volume 1 DVD Movie LOTS AND LOTS OF JETS AND PLANES VOL.1, VOL.2 AND VOL.3 Lots and Lots of JETS and PLANES DVD Vol. 1 LOTS AND LOTS OF CARS, MONSTER TRUCKS AND HIGH SPEED RACERS VOL.1 Lots and Lots of Fast Cars, Monster Trucks and High Speed Racers Vol 1 DVD - Extreme Motorsports LOTS AND LOTS OF TRUCKS VOL.1 AND VOL.2 Lots and Lots of Trucks Vol. 1 LOTS AND LOTS OF PLAYFUL PENGUINS Lots and Lots of Playful Penguins & Their Toe-Tappin Feet -All About Penguins DVD LOTS AND LOTS OF PENGUINS IN THE WILD Lots and Lots of Penguins In The Wild DVD These are all award-winning DVDs that make great gifts for kids of all ages and are not available in stores so order here! Kids with autism love them too because they contain lots of action shots and fun, sing-a-long music from award-winning children's musician James Coffey. ALSO SEARCH FOR OTHER DVDS, BOOKS AND CDS FROM MARSHALL PUBLISHING INCLUDING: TV's Greatest Game Shows Book and DVD; TV's Greatest Comedians; Lots and Lots of Fire Safety Tips and Songs; ALL ABOARD The Legends of the Rails - The exciting history of passenger trains in America!; The Complete History of America's Railroads.
